credentials.name: Postgres Production
credentials.note: Replace YOUR_RDS_ENDPOINT_HERE with the RDS endpoint from `aws rds describe-db-instances --db-instance-identifier clickpay-pg --query 'DBInstances[0].Endpoint.Address'`

credentials.name: AWS SES
credentials.note: Only needed for Workflow C (email sending). Ensure IAM user has ses:SendEmail permission.

workflow_updates.workflow-b-matching.json: Replace 'PG_CREDENTIAL_ID' with the ID of the Postgres credential saved above.
workflow_updates.workflow-a-product-discovery.json: Replace 'PG_CREDENTIAL_ID' with the ID of the Postgres credential.
workflow_updates.workflow-c-notification.json: Replace 'PG_CREDENTIAL_ID' and 'AWS_CREDENTIAL_ID' with actual credential IDs.
